chartTitle.name: Title of the chart
chartTitle.description: This text field represent the title of the chart displayed on the page.

interval.name: Default interval of the chart
interval.description: Permit to change the first displayed interval of the chart

oneAxis.name: Only one axis for all series
oneAxis.description: It allows you to create one axis for all series, with this option, series could be compare with the same scale.

customYAxisMinMax.name: Manually set min and max of y axis
customYAxisMinMax.description: Enabling this section allow you to set the min and max of your chart. If it is not activated min and max will be computed automatically. This section is active only when the option unique axis is selected

maximumValue.name: Maximum Y axis value
maximumValue.description: Set the maximum Y Axis value

minimumValue.name: Minimum Y axis value
minimumValue.description: Set the minimum Y Axis value

item.name: Plot
item.description: This section describe the configuration of a plot

source.name: Data to display
source.description: Choose the data of a device to display on the chart

color.name: Color of the plot
color.description: Permit to change the color of the plot
